description: Greening 2014 Sochi Olympics: A Strategy and Action Plan for the Greening Legacy

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The objective is to produce a Greening Strategy and Action Plan for the 2014 Winter Olympics in the Sochi. The project will develop greening recommendations and actions plans in six specific sectors. By intoducing an early CC planning the project will help set up "carbon neutral" event and unleash the potential for GHG emission reduction during preparation to and convening the Sochi Olympics. In doing so the MSP will come up with an integrated programmatic approach (a set of project proposals) for the Greening of the Sochi Olympics
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: PIMS 4320 CC MSP: GREENING 201

title: GREENING 2014 SOCHI OLYMPICS
